document_data.name: Dhoelath's Tower
document_data.mainbody: '''Dhoelath's Tower''' was a green marble tower in [[Leuthilspar]], [[Evermeet]].
document_data.Description: The black and white striped tower had balconies and a reflective black marble roof.
document_data.History: Around [[1367 DR]], the tower was inhabited by the [[wizard]] [[Dhoelath]].
document_data.Rumors and legends: Hidden within the halls of the tower, Dhoelath was said to hold the secret to powerful [[high magic]].
